nodes.text: Merdeths were a species of carnivorous creatures native to the planet Geonosis.

Merdeths were created for Geonosis and the Outer Rim Worlds, a book produced in 2004 by Wizards of the Coast as a supplement for their Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was confirmed to be canon by Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, a reference book due to come out in 2015.
